name: Internship with the Human Rights Commission
description: Apply for an internship with the Human Rights Commission. Join HRC for exciting social justice projects in the City.
fullDescription: Apply for an internship with the Human Rights Commission. Join HRC for exciting social justice projects in the City.
whatTheyOffer: Apply for an internship with the Human Rights Commission. Join HRC for exciting social justice projects in the City.
howToGetIt: Write a cover letter: - Explain why you want to intern with HRC and how your background fits their work. - Check the "Policy" tab on the website for HRC projects, or suggest your own human rights projects. - State if you prefer to work in the Office of Racial Equity, the Office of Sexual Harassment & Assault Response & Prevention, or if you have no preference. - Describe your time commitment. Interns usually work at least two full days a week for three months, but we can adjust for your class schedule. Last Updated: 05/15/2024
address: 25 Van Ness Avenue #800, San Francisco, CA, 94102
